DOC.brief_summary: The PK and tolerability of paricalcitol after repeated intravenous administration for 2 weeks (total 6 doses at every HD session) are studied in subjects with 2°HPT who are receiving HD 3 times a week for stable chronic renal failure.
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose of this study is pharmacokinetic & tolerability.
DOC.criteria: Subjects with 2°HPT who are receiving HD 3 times a week for stable chronic renal failure Subject is considered by investigator, for any reason, to be an unsuitable candidate for the study
